thread.title: Pinky Roshan pleased that her daughter Sunaina has found happiness
thread.title_full: Pinky Roshan pleased that her daughter Sunaina has found happiness - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Pinky Roshan pleased that her daughter Sunaina has found happiness
text:
Hrithik Roshan's sister Sunaina has been a fighter, who has overcome personal and physical setbacks.
READ: Hrithik's sister Sunaina leaves family home
We are happy for the brave woman, who seems to have found happiness in the company of special friend Subir Dhar. Sunaina posted pictures of the two on social media recently, with friends wishing the couple. Mother Pinky Roshan too expressed happiness by writing to her daughter, "Your smile gives me strength."
WATCH: 'To Dad, With Love': Hrithik, Sunaina Launch Book On Rakesh Roshan
